description: As an Application user I should be able to get weather forecast details based on input provided
name: Display the weather forecast

elements.name: To verify 5 days weather forecast is displayed for the city entered.

steps.name: I navigate to the weather forecast page
I enter the city as "edinburgh"
I should be able to see weather forecast data for five days

elements.name: To verify 5 days weather forecast is displayed for the city entered.

steps.name: I navigate to the weather forecast page
I enter the city as "aberdeen"
I should be able to see weather forecast data for five days

elements.name: To verify 5 days weather forecast is displayed for the city entered.

steps.name: I navigate to the weather forecast page
I enter the city as "dundee"
I should be able to see weather forecast data for five days

elements.name: To verify 5 days weather forecast is displayed for the city entered.

steps.name: I navigate to the weather forecast page
I enter the city as "glasgow"
I should be able to see weather forecast data for five days

elements.name: To verify 5 days weather forecast is displayed for the city entered.

steps.name: I navigate to the weather forecast page
I enter the city as "stirling"
I should be able to see weather forecast data for five days

elements.name: To verify the application displays 3 hourly forecast on selecting a day.

steps.name: I navigate to the weather forecast page
I enter the city as "edinburgh"
I should be able to see weather forecast data for five days
I select day "1"
I should be able to see 3 hourly forecast for that day "1"

elements.name: To verify the application displays 3 hourly forecast on selecting a day.

steps.name: I navigate to the weather forecast page
I enter the city as "aberdeen"
I should be able to see weather forecast data for five days
I select day "2"
I should be able to see 3 hourly forecast for that day "2"

elements.name: To verify the application displays 3 hourly forecast on selecting a day.

steps.name: I navigate to the weather forecast page
I enter the city as "dundee"
I should be able to see weather forecast data for five days
I select day "3"
I should be able to see 3 hourly forecast for that day "3"

elements.name: To verify the application displays 3 hourly forecast on selecting a day.

steps.name: I navigate to the weather forecast page

I select day "4"
I should be able to see 3 hourly forecast for that day "4"

elements.name: To verify the application displays 3 hourly forecast on selecting a day.

steps.name: I navigate to the weather forecast page
I enter the city as "stirling"
I should be able to see weather forecast data for five days
I select day "5"
I should be able to see 3 hourly forecast for that day "5"

elements.name: To verify the application hides 3 hourly forecast on selecting the same day again.

steps.name: I navigate to the weather forecast page
I enter the city as "edinburgh"
I should be able to see weather forecast data for five days
I select day "1"
I should be able to see 3 hourly forecast for that day "1"
I select day "1"
I should not be able to see 3 hourly forecast for that day

steps.name: I navigate to the weather forecast page

elements.name: To verify the application is showing the 3 hour data for daily forecast of current condition, wind speed, direction, aggregate rainfall and temperatures.

steps.name: I navigate to the weather forecast page
I enter the city as "edinburgh"
I should be able to see weather forecast data for five days
I select day "1"
I should be able to see 3 hourly forecast for that day "1"
I should be able to see summary of current condtion of the day
I should be able to see summary of most dominant wind speed of the day "1"
I should be able to see summary of current direction of the day
I should be able to see summary of Aggregate rainfall of the day "1"
I should be able to see summary of min and max temparture of the day "1"

I should be able to see summary of min and max temparture of the day "2"
